name: 吳美玲
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week 1: Orientation
Week 2~4: Listening & Speaking Unit 1--Information Overload
Reading & Writing Unit 1--Untruth and Consequences
Week 5~7: Listening & Speaking Unit 2--The Achilles Heel
Reading & Writing Unit 2--Dreams Never Die
Week 8: Review
Week 9: Campus-wide Proficiency Test 1 and Mid-term exam
Week 10~12: Listening & Speaking Unit 3--Early to Bed, Early to Rise
Reading & Writing Unit 3--Dying for Their Beliefs
Week 13~15: Listening & Speaking Unit 4--Animal Intelligence
Reading & Writing Unit 4--Animal Intelligence
Week 16~17: Listening & Speaking Unit 5--Longevity
Reading & Writing Unit 5--Longevity
Week 18: Campus-wide Proficiency Test 2 and Final exam
scorePolicy:
A部分
平常成績 (出席,小考,作業):40%
期中考:30%
期末考:30%
B部分:
期中會考成績+期末會考成績
學期成績: A*70% +B*30%
materials:
Testbooks:
NorthStar Book 4 Listening and Speaking (3rd Edition) by Tess Ferree & Kim Sanabria, 2009
NorthStar Book 4 Reading and Writing (3rd Edition) by Andrew K. English & Laura Monahon English,2009
